pull.title: contrib: Adding -daemon default option to bitcoind.init
pull.body: Adding -daemon default option otherwise it won't `sudo service bitcoind start` hangs. Also specifying explicitly the -conf and -datadir options, for clarity, and to let users know how to override.

verification.payload:
tree 0ae504f878d6655afa566fb3aff452179af0c5f1
parent 86ff0413bb8f8173d3b3a1987875ff40b1094926
author Mystical Tech <rimkashox@gmail.com> 1543973812 +0100
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1543973812 +0100

Adding -daemon default option to bitcoind

Adding -daemon default option otherwise it won't `sudo service bitcoind start` hangs. Also specifying explicitly the -conf and -datadir options, for clarity, and to let users know how to override.

events.message:
Adding -daemon default option to bitcoind

Adding -daemon default option otherwise it won't `sudo service bitcoind start` hangs. Also specifying explicitly the -conf and -datadir options, for clarity, and to let users know how to override.

events.body: Commit message and PR title are misleading, should prefix with `contrib: `.
cc @joshrabinowitz who seems to be the only other contributor to this file, four years ago

This seems to have bled out a bit.
@mysticaltech can you please address @promag's comment?

rename.to: contrib: Adding -daemon default option to bitcoind.init

events.body: I think this is taking too long for a one-line change, so I'm closing. Let me know if you want me to reopen this.

comments.body:
Note that it is possible to specify more options by setting `BITCOIND_OPTS`.

Instead of adding these options (whose values don't make sense) you could improve the comment above by mentioning these notable options?

Our goal here is to have a working default bitcoind.init file, so the only option not necessary here is `-disablewallet`, maybe we could leave this one for the user to setup in `/etc/sysconfig/bitcoind`, what do you think?
